Post Your News Evolt

21 Apr 1999

Taking evolt.org to the next level, we've added what you see now. *Anyone* can post news or other info about web related issues.

Everyone also has the option to comment on stories that others have posted in a threaded discussion format. We hope you'll enjoy the new features we've added and learn to use them as well! Remember, this is *your* community!!
